title: A Spy in the House
description: 1850s London. Rescued from the noose, orphan thief Mary Quinn is offered an education in fine manners at Miss Scrimshaw's Academy for Girls. At 17, she joins The Agency. As the daughter's companion, she infiltrates the Thorolds, investigates missing cargo ships. But the household is full of dangerous deceptions. Action and suspense, banter and romance.
author: Y.S. Lee
